import React from 'react' import { deletedbook } from '../Service/BookService' function ListeBook(props) { return (
{props.books.map((el)=>)}
Name Author Category Edit Delete
{el.nom} {el.acteur} {el.category} {props.setidtoupdate(el.id);props.setshow(true)}}> deletedbook(props.books,props.setbooks,el.id)}>
) } export default ListeBook
